description: Describes Amazon ECS clusters that are registered with a stack. If you specify only a stack ID, you can use the MaxResults and NextToken parameters to paginate the response. However, AWS OpsWorks Stacks currently supports only one cluster per layer, so the result set has a maximum of one element.  Required Permissions: To use this action, an IAM user must have a Show, Deploy, or Manage permissions level for the stack or an attached policy that explicitly grants permission. For more information about user permissions, see Managing User Permissions. This call accepts only one resource-identifying parameter.
